languages.text:
Один раз за {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g} получение {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}варп-урона{/g} или воздействие {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}психосилы{/g} на Айшару предоставляет ей {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}дополнительный ход{/g}.
Восстановление этой {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способности{/g} завершается в начале {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} Айшары.
languages.original_text:
Once per {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, any {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}warp damage{/g} or effect of a {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g} against Aishara will grant Aishara an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g}.
The {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}cooldown{/g} of this {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} is reset at the start of Aishara's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
Once per round, any warp damage or effect of a psychic power against Aishara will grant Aishara an extra turn.
The cooldown of this ability is reset at the start of Aishara's turn.

Once per {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, any {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}warp damage{/g} or effect of a {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g} against Aishara will grant Aishara an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g}.
The {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}cooldown{/g} of this {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} is reset at the start of Aishara's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

Once per {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, any {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}warp damage{/g} or effect of a {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g} against Aishara will grant Aishara an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g}.
The {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}cooldown{/g} of this {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} is reset at the start of Aishara's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

languages.text:
每当任何成员对艾莎拉造成{g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}亚空间伤害{/g}，或使用{g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}灵能能力{/g}施加任何效果时，艾莎拉都会获得一个{g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}额外回合{/g}。此效果每{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}可触发一次。
此{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}的{g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}冷却时间{/g}会在艾莎拉的{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始时重置。

The {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}cooldown{/g} of this {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} is reset at the start of Aishara's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

此{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}的{g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}冷却时间{/g}会在艾莎拉的{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始时重置。

此{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}的{g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}冷却时间{/g}会在艾莎拉的{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始时重置。

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}ごとに一度、アイシャラに対する{g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}ワープダメージ{/g}や{g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}超能力{/g}効果はアイシャラに{g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}追加ターン{/g}を与える。
この{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}の{g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}クールダウン{/g}は、アイシャラの{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}の最初にリセットされる。

Once per {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, any {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}warp damage{/g} or effect of a {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g} against Aishara will grant Aishara an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g}.
The {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}cooldown{/g} of this {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} is reset at the start of Aishara's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

languages.text:
Una vez por {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}, cualquier {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}daño de disformidad{/g} o efecto de {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}poder psíquico{/g} que reciba Aishara le otorgará un {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}turno extra{/g}.
El {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}tiempo de recuperación{/g} de esta {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} se reinicia al comienzo del {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} de Aishara.

The {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}cooldown{/g} of this {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} is reset at the start of Aishara's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text:

El {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}tiempo de recuperación{/g} de esta {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} se reinicia al comienzo del {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} de Aishara.

languages.text:
Einmal pro {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} gewährt jeder {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}Warpschaden{/g} oder Effekt einer {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psionischen Kraft{/g} gegen Aishara einen {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}Zusatzzug{/g}.
Die {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}Abklingzeit{/g} dieser {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g} wird zu Beginn von Aisharas {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g} zurückgesetzt.

languages.text:
Une fois par {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, les {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}dégâts du Warp{/g} ou l'effet d'un {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}pouvoir psychique{/g} utilisé contre Aishara lui confèrent un {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}tour supplémentaire{/g}.
Le {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}temps de recharge{/g} de cette {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} est réinitialisé au début du {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} d'Aishara.

traits.locale_text:

Le {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}délai de récupération{/g} de cette {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} est réinitialisé au début du {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} d'Aishara.

languages.text:
Aishara'ya karşı her türlü {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}öteboyut hasarı{/g} veya {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}ruhsezi gücü{/g} etkisi, her {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rauntta{/g} bir kez Aishara'ya bir {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}ek tur{/g} kazandırır.
Bu {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}kabiliyetin{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}dolum süresi{/g}, Aishara'nın {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turunun{/g} başında sıfırlanır.
